articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Who is Tanveer Sangha? Indian-origin spinner who shone on debut for Australia - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Tanveer Sangha shone in his Australia debut and is of Indian-origin. | Cricket
articles.content: Tanveer Sangha was in hot form, taking four wickets in his Australia debut during the first T20I against South Africa in Kingsmead, in Durban. Sangha was slotted into the playing XI after veteran spi… [+2012 chars]
